title: 1/bd, Lush landscaped grounds, Located in North Las Vegas
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '1', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Square Feet:', '741', 'Address:', '675 E Azure Ave', 'Whether you invite friends over for a day at the pool or to show off your grill-master skills in the barbecue pavilion, Azures Apartment Homes embraces laid-back luxury and the modern comforts of today.', 'Our spacious apartment homes are outfitted with luxe details from wood-style flooring to stone countertops.', 'Plus, residents enjoy an array of indoor and outdoor amenities including a gym and fully equipped resident social lounge.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Resident social lounge with demonstration kitchen and billiards table', 'Built-in desks', 'Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', 'Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Separate dining area', 'Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements', 'Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating', 'Covered parking                                                                                         Featured amenity', 'Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Ceiling fans in living areas Select units', 'Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Breakfast bars available', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
